context_bundle.content:
Brownfield improvement strategies.

Assessment:
- Code quality metrics
- Test coverage gaps
- Technical debt inventory
- Performance bottlenecks

Quick Wins (Week 1):
- Add linting/formatting
- Fix critical bugs
- Improve CI speed
- Add basic monitoring

Medium Term (Month 1):
- Increase test coverage
- Refactor hot paths
- Update dependencies
- Document architecture

Long Term:
- Modularization
- API versioning
- Database optimization
- Infrastructure modernization
